short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The easiest way to find professor ratings!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simply mouse over a professor's name and the ratings will appear instantly!

Currently supports the following schools:

- Baruch College
- Borough of Manhattan Community College
- Brooklyn College
- City College
- College of Staten Island
- Hunter College
- John Jay College
- Medgar Evers College
- New York City College of Technology
- York College

If you would like to request your school to be added, drop a line in the comments.
